mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE MC_STATUS = 'Y' AND AUDIT_YN IS NULL AND CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} ORDER BY REG_DT ASC

SELECT BC_IDX , CB_IDX , FILE_NO , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , FILE_SIZE , MC_IDX FROM EZ_CONTENT_FILE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND MC_IDX = #{mcIdx} ORDER BY FILE_NO ASC

SELECT ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL RN day)), '%Y.%m.%d') FROM ( WITH RECURSIVE RGEN(RN) AS (SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT RN+1 FROM RGEN WHERE RN < 14 ) SELECT RN FROM RGEN ) C WHERE DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), INTERVAL RN day) ,'%w') IN (1,2,3,4,5) AND DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.REG_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')+RN,'%Y-%m-%d') <> ALL (SELECT HOL_DATE FROM EZ_HOLIDAY WHERE 1 = 1) AND @rownum <= CASE WHEN A.REG_HH >= '18' THEN 3 ELSE 2 END ) AS DEAD_LINE FROM ( SELECT REG_DT , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(REG_DT,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%H') AS REG_HH , @rownum := @rownum + 1 FROM ( SELECT MAX(REG_DT) AS REG_DT FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE MC_STATUS = 'Y' AND TEMP_YN IS NULL AND AUDIT_YN IS NULL AND CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND (@rownum:=0)=0 ) B ) A

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS RN FROM( SELECT * FROM EZ_CONTENT_MINWON_RESULT WHERE MC_STATUS = 'Y' AND AUDIT_YN IS NULL AND TEMP_YN IS NULL AND MC_DELAY_DAY IS NOT NULL AND CB_IDX = #{cbIdx} AND BC_IDX = #{bcIdx} AND (@rownum:=0)=0 ORDER BY MC_DELAY_DAY DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN = 1
